ResponseContext.description: The context of the response to provide additional information of the main responsed content

code.description: response code, underlying application can supplement additional code for client action mapping

title.description: the title of this response, can be used as display title

message.description: free text content provided for direct display. eg. UI msgbox

context.description: free text content to provide further detail for client processing. eg. render display in UI, not for direct display
